text: Balka is a village and seaside resort in Denmark. Balka or Bałka may also refer to: * Balka, Snizhne, a settlement in Snizhne, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine * Balka Suman (born 1983), Indian politician * Mirosław Bałka (born 1958), Polish artist ==See also== * Balk (disambiguation) * Balkan (disambiguation) * Balke, a surname
title: Balka (disambiguation)
